pages.text: $(li)The TNT is an explosive block.$(br)$(li)You can use a Flint & Steel, Fire Arrows, or any kind of redstone powder source to activate it.
$(li)When it explotes inflicts explosive damage to any near creature and damage the environment.$(br)$(li)This block can be used to craft a Minecart with TNT or a Bomb in a Crafting Table.
